intro.label: Welcome to Opduin
intro.description1: More than 90 years of hospitality combined in a tasteful, comfortable and contemporary hotel. The beach is within walking distance, the village and cozy restaurants are next door.
intro.description2: Plenty of opportunities for relaxation, exercise and recreation. Rooms ranging from suites to holiday homes, with options for single occupancy through apartments. All rooms with air conditioning and comfortable bedding, positioned atop a dune.

cta.title: Ready for stillness?
cta.description: Escape to where the horizon stretches endlessly and the only schedule is the rhythm of the tides.

items.quote: The staff remembered our names, the spa treatments were heavenly, and watching the sunset from our balcony was unforgettable.
Morning swims, sauna sessions, and the best seafood I've had in years. The perfect place to disconnect and find stillness.
The kids loved the beach and bike rides, while we enjoyed the restaurant and spa. Texel is now our favorite Dutch destination.

island.label: Texel Island
island.description: The largest Dutch Wadden island. Endless beaches, rolling dunes, and a rhythm set only by the tides. A short journey from the mainland, yet a world apart.

rooms.pageDescription: Thoughtfully designed spaces with views of dunes or forest. Each room offers modern comfort with island charm.
rooms.heroTagline: Waking up in silence, fresh sheets and a clean sea breeze

intro.label: Accommodations
intro.title: A villa in the dunes
intro.lead: Light and airy, without any unnecessary hotel furniture, air-conditioned, beautiful fabrics, comfortable beds and a mini fridge.
intro.p1: Slide open the curtains for a view over the island and the dunes. Make a Nespresso, open the windows and slowly wake up.
intro.p2: Opduin has 6 different possibilities to choose from. Double rooms with a king size bed, large suites with an extra sleeping couch, apartments with separate bedrooms, a holiday house for a big family, holiday homes for a small family and even six small single rooms.
intro.highlightDescription: Free sauna access, €5 discount per night, and flexible cancellation when you book directly with us.

items.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
items.answer: Standard check-in is after 3 PM with checkout before 11 AM. Early arrivals are accommodated if rooms are ready, or you can leave your contact info for a call when your room becomes available. Late checkout ('lazy Sunday') costs €42.50 until the last ferry at 9 PM, subject to room availability.

items.question: What is the cancellation policy?
items.answer: Direct bookings allow free cancellation up to 24 hours before arrival (3 PM cutoff). Cancellations within 24 hours incur full charges for overnight stays and beauty treatments, though breakfast and taxes are refunded. Third-party bookings follow their respective policies.

items.question: Are pets allowed?
items.answer: Dogs are permitted on request at €28.50 per night. We provide a dog pillow and water bowl. Dogs cannot enter the restaurant, and an entire floor remains pet-free for allergic guests.

items.question: What costs should I expect?
items.answer: Municipal taxes of €3.85 per person per night apply at checkout. Breakfast is included for standard rooms (8-10:30 AM service). The West Hampton family home excludes breakfast but offers it separately at €24 (adults) or €12 (children).

items.question: Is parking available?
items.answer: Free on-site parking is available with limited spaces. We recommend arriving early to secure a spot.

items.question: What wellness facilities are available?
items.answer: The heated pool operates from 7 AM to 11 PM. Sauna rentals cost €10/hour, while massage chairs and solarium carry separate fees. Direct bookers receive complimentary sauna tokens.

cta.title: Book Your Stay
cta.description: Reserve via our website or just make a call. We would love to put together your Texel-holiday with you. Care for some ideas? Have a look at our package deals.

restaurant.pageDescription: Local ingredients from Texel and the Wadden Sea, prepared fresh daily by our chefs.

philosophy.label: In the Dunes
philosophy.title: Fresh and homemade
philosophy.text1: In the middle of the dunes of De Koog we made the restaurant and terrace. Good food, extensive choice, as many local products as possible and always fresh and homemade.
philosophy.text2: Our chefs source the freshest and most sustainable ingredients from the region, from the Wadden Islands to the coastline from Den Oever to Delfzijl. The sea provides us with day-fresh fish and shellfish, while the land provides organic meat and seasonal vegetables. Each product is carefully selected to reflect the rich biodiversity and flavor of the Wadden region.

restaurant.dogFreeText: The restaurant is completely dog-free. Would you like to have a bite to eat with your dog? Then you are welcome in our bar for a simple 2-course menu.

texel.title: Texel & Wadden Products
texel.description: As many products as possible from Texel and other Wadden Sea regions

organic.title: Organic & Seasonal
organic.description: Organic meat and seasonal vegetables from local farms

fish.title: Day-fresh Fish
fish.description: The sea provides us with day-fresh fish and shellfish

breakfast.title: Breakfast
breakfast.description: Extensive buffet for hotel guests. Fresh breads, local cheeses, eggs to order, and island honey.

lunch.title: Lunch
lunch.description: Light dishes and sandwiches. Perfect after a morning beach walk or cycle tour.

dinner.title: Dinner
dinner.description: Multi-course dining experience. Choose 3 to 6 courses showcasing the island's finest.

restaurant.reserveCta: Reserve your table for lunch or dinner. Also for non-hotel guests.

privateDining.title: Private Dining & Events
privateDining.description: Celebrate special occasions in our private dining room. Customized menus, attentive service, and views of the dunes. Perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, or intimate gatherings.

restaurant.imageAlt: Slow Food Chefs Alliance - Restaurant Opduin

wellness.pageDescription: Escape to tranquility. Our spa offers a sanctuary of calm with treatments inspired by the sea and dunes.
wellness.heroDescription: There is nothing like personal attention. Our certified beauty specialists work with Thalgo — light and fresh quality products with its origin from the sea.

philosophy.label: Beauty Salon
philosophy.title: Thalgo Marine Cosmetics
philosophy.p1: Our certified beauty specialists work with Thalgo — light and fresh quality products with its origin from the sea. French marine cosmetics renowned for their purity and effectiveness.
philosophy.p2: All treatments are by appointment only and accessible to non-guests as well. Book your treatment by phone or check availability in our online booking tool.
philosophy.p3: For private sauna bookings: €12.50 per person per hour.

pool.name: Swimming Pool
pool.description: Heated indoor pool with Jacuzzi and children's pool. Swimming lessons on Tuesdays.

sauna.name: Finnish Sauna & Steam Bath
sauna.description: Traditional Finnish sauna and Turkish steam bath. Customary use without swimwear during free hours.

solarium.name: Solarium
solarium.description: Quick tanning service available for guests and visitors.

treatmentsSection.label: Treatments
treatmentsSection.title: Our Treatment Menu
treatmentsSection.description: From soothing massages to revitalizing facials. Signature Texel treatments with local honey and Noordkroon sheepscream.

cta.title: Book Your Treatment
cta.description: Our salon is open to everyone, not just hotel guests. All treatments are by appointment only. Call to reserve your personal wellness experience.

intro.title: Better value, more perks
intro.p1: Booking via Booking.com is convenient, but pricey — we pay 15% commission on every third-party booking. That's money we'd rather spend on you.
intro.p2: Our packages are exclusively for direct bookers: free extras, discounts, and flexible cancellation. Choose your perfect Texel escape below.
intro.highlightDescription: Free sauna access, €5/night discount, and extras you won't find elsewhere.
intro.imageAlt: Relaxation package at Grand Hotel Opduin

cta.title: Book Your Package
cta.description: Reserve via our website or just make a call. We are happy to answer your questions and help you choose the right package for your Texel holiday.

warmWinter.title: Warm Winter Offer
warmWinter.subtitle: Cozy escape with wellness included
warmWinter.description: Escape the winter cold with our warming package. Enjoy a cozy stay with breakfast, afternoon coffee and cake, and full access to our wellness facilities including sauna, steam room, and heated indoor pool.
includes: Coffee and cake in the afternoon

earlySpring.title: Early Spring Week
earlySpring.subtitle: Up to 50% discount on accommodation
earlySpring.description: Book early and save big on your spring holiday. Enjoy the awakening nature of Texel with up to 50% discount on your overnight stay with breakfast. The perfect time to explore the island before the summer crowds arrive.

opduinRelax.title: Opduin Relax Deal
opduinRelax.subtitle: 3 nights of pure relaxation
opduinRelax.description: Unwind completely with our 3-night relaxation package. Includes a delicious dinner at our restaurant, full access to wellness facilities, and everything you need for a peaceful retreat in the dunes of Texel.

exploreTexel.title: Explore Texel Deal
exploreTexel.subtitle: 2 nights discovering the island
exploreTexel.description: The perfect package for those who want to discover all that Texel has to offer. Includes entrance to Ecomare seal sanctuary, a picnic bag for your adventures, and dinner to end your day of exploration.

tasteOfTexel.title: Taste of Texel Deal
tasteOfTexel.subtitle: 2 nights of culinary delight
tasteOfTexel.description: Experience the best flavors Texel has to offer. This culinary package includes two dinners at our restaurant featuring local Texel lamb, fresh seafood, and island produce. A feast for food lovers.

about.pageDescription: Where luxury meets the rhythm of the tides. Family-run since 1932.

intro.label: In the Dunes
intro.title: A sanctuary at the edge of the world
intro.p1: Nestled among the dunes of Texel, Grand Hotel Opduin has been welcoming guests for nearly a century. What began as a modest seaside retreat has evolved into one of the Netherlands' most cherished boutique destinations.
intro.p2: Our philosophy remains unchanged: to offer genuine hospitality that honors the island's natural beauty and the Wadden Sea's UNESCO World Heritage status. Every detail, from our locally-sourced cuisine to our sustainable practices, reflects our deep connection to this remarkable place.
intro.p3: Today, the third generation of the Petit family continues this legacy, balancing time-honored traditions with modern comforts for the discerning traveler.

hospitality.title: Genuine Hospitality
hospitality.description: Three generations of the Petit family have welcomed guests. That warmth is in our DNA.

stewardship.title: Island Stewardship
stewardship.description: We protect what makes Texel special—from supporting local farmers to preserving dune ecosystems.

luxury.title: Thoughtful Luxury
luxury.description: Excellence without pretension. Every detail serves your comfort, not our ego.

items.title: The Beginning
items.description: The Petit family opens a small guesthouse for visitors to Texel, offering simple rooms and hearty island meals.

items.title: Post-War Renaissance
items.description: After careful restoration, the hotel expands with a new wing, terrace restaurant, and the first glimpses of what would become our signature dune views.

items.title: Wellness Pioneer
items.description: We become the first hotel on Texel to offer spa facilities, introducing the island to the concept of seaside wellness.

items.title: Grand Renovation
items.description: A complete renovation transforms Opduin into a luxury destination while preserving our family heritage and island character.

items.title: Sustainable Future
items.description: Achieving carbon-neutral status, installing solar panels, and deepening our commitment to local sourcing and island conservation.

sustainability.label: Sustainability
sustainability.title: Caring for our island home
sustainability.description: We believe luxury and sustainability go hand in hand. From solar panels on our roof to partnerships with local farmers, we're committed to protecting the natural beauty that makes Texel so special.

team.label: The People
team.title: Meet our team
team.description: Behind every great stay is a team that cares. These are the people who make Opduin special.

members.name: Lucas Petit
members.quote: My grandfather built this place with his hands. My job is to honor that while building something even better for the next generation.

members.name: Maria Jansen
members.quote: Texel's bounty inspires every dish. The sea, the land, the seasons — they tell the story. I just translate it to the plate.

members.name: Thomas de Vries
members.quote: True wellness comes from connecting with nature. Here, the dunes and sea do half the work. We just help you slow down.

location.label: Getting Here
location.title: Find us on Texel
location.description: Just 90 minutes from Amsterdam, yet a world away. Take the ferry from Den Helder (20 minutes) and follow the dunes to De Koog.

cta.title: Experience Opduin
cta.description: The best way to understand what makes us special is to visit. We look forward to welcoming you.

sisterHotels.pageDescription: Five distinctive hotels across the Netherlands, each with its own character. United by a commitment to genuine hospitality.
sisterHotels.heroDescription: Five distinctive hotels across the Netherlands, each with its own character. United by a commitment to genuine hospitality.
sisterHotels.hoscomDescription1: Lucas Petit, owner of Hoscom, manages six distinctive hotels across the Netherlands. Each property has been carefully developed to offer guests a unique experience, rooted in local character and genuine hospitality.
sisterHotels.hoscomDescription2: What unites them is a shared philosophy: hotels should be places where guests can truly be themselves, surrounded by thoughtful details and warm service. From the dunes of Texel to the streets of Leeuwarden, each hotel tells its own story.
sisterHotels.beginJourneyText: Grand Hotel Opduin is the jewel of the collection—a seaside sanctuary where the dunes meet the Wadden Sea.

contact.heroDescription: We're here to help you plan your perfect stay on Texel.

parking.title: Free Parking
parking.description: Parking on Opduin's own parking lot is free of charge. For island-wide parking you need to purchase a Texel vignet online.

byCar.title: By Car
byCar.description: From western/southern Netherlands via Amsterdam ringroad (A10), through Zaandam, Purmerend, Hoorn to Den Helder. From east via Afsluitdijk (A7).

byFerry.title: By Ferry
byFerry.description: TESO ferry leaves from Den Helder every hour (on the half hour). 20 minute crossing, no reservation needed.

publicTransport.title: Public Transport
publicTransport.description: Bus 33 takes you to the ferry from Den Helder station. On Texel, bus 28 takes you from the ferry to Opduin.

contact.subject: Subject

meetings.pageDescription: Host your next meeting or event in our inspiring venue with views of the dunes.
meetings.heroDescription: You will organize a meeting that no one will forget. And that's what matters.

intro.label: Conference & Events
intro.title: Meetings that inspire
intro.lead: An original place where participants are completely isolated from their normal activities. But still easily accessible. An endless variety of professionally organized activities in and around the location.
intro.p1: Intimate enough for a small gathering, but also well equipped for a meeting of 200 participants. Meetings on Texel are always successful.
intro.p2: With a well chosen destination and a good program participants get involved and excited. The atmosphere and comfort in combination with a flexible organization give everyone the chance to grow.
intro.highlightDescription: From board meetings of 10 people to conferences of 200 participants - we adapt to your needs.

teambuilding.title: Teambuilding Activities
teambuilding.p1: Oyster mudflat hiking, nature excursions, flying above the island, surfing... So many activities to let your guests experience something special between meetings.
teambuilding.p2: We are happy to help you find a suitable activity and arrange everything for you.

party.title: A Texel Party
party.p1: A great party is well organized and at the same time gives your guests the opportunity to completely relax. When you invite guests to the island, the fun already begins — it's like going abroad, but even better.
party.p2: Texel offers a world of possibilities. Food and drinks grown by local neighbors, fierce nature, adventurous sports, high-standing art and culture, wellness, and unique skies on endless beaches.
party.p3: Weddings, anniversaries, family gatherings — your guests don't just stop by, they enjoy a real happening.

wedding.title: Getting Married on Texel
wedding.p1: Opduin is an official wedding location. Ideal for small weddings. You can get married in one of our rooms or on the beach and afterwards a relaxed dinner with the whole group.
wedding.p2: To ensure that your wedding day is arranged according to your wishes, we work together with Sophie of Trouwen Texel. She will organize your wedding (or part of it) with heart and soul, so that you can enjoy this special day carefree.
wedding.contactWedding: Contact the Texel wedding planner Sophie:

packages.title: Meeting Packages
packages.p1: The complete package. You do not have to worry about anything, we make sure that you and your guests are taken care of in the right way.
packages.p2: Including meeting room rental, lunches, dinner and treats. Prices depend on your wishes and the number of participants. We are happy to make an offer for you.
packages.p3: Need extra ideas for an activity on Texel? Just give us a call and we will help you with some suggestions. We are also glad to take care of the organizational part.

rooms.title: Meeting Rooms
rooms.description: All rooms on first floor with natural daylight. Beamer, screen, sound system & flipchart included.
rooms.additionalEquipment: Additional equipment available through third-party hire.
